name: OR_CASE_WAIT_PAT_LOCATION
description: Patient wait location and associated number determined by Wait Time Information System (WTIS).

columns.name: CASE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the case request record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: WAIT_PAT_LOCATION_C_NAME
columns.description: Name and Wait Time Information System (WTIS)-assigned number of the location in which the patient is located.
